channel.title: [Suggestion] Noble/Aristocrat/Apostle Rework
channel.description:
"Ici, abort now, I repeat ***Abort***! Trying to rework noble is a fool's errand!"
But i believe in myself (somewhat) so I'm going to damn well try to make a Noble that's consistent, neat, and easy to understand.
> # [color=steblue]The Noble[/color] > [color=grey]**Blue Dragon Social**[/color] > > **Influence (Passive)** - Your vote counts as two for trials. This passive carries over if your class changes or if you're possessed. > > **Poltiical Pressure (Day)** - Same as current. - 3 uses. > > **Gossip (Day)** - Send a whisper under somebody else's name - 3 uses. > > **Espionage (Night)** - View all whispers tommorow - 2 uses. > > > *You win when all threats to the Blue Dragon have been eliminated*
PS: this is just a prototype, Gossip may seem weird for a BD class but it has its purposes in FPSing and is crucially non-confirmable.
> # [color=purple]The Aristocrat[/color] > [color=grey]**Uneen Social**[/color] > > **Influence (Passive)** - Your vote counts as two for trials. This passive carries over if your class changes or if you're possessed. > > **Poltiical Pressure (Day)** - Same as current. - 3 uses. > > **Gossip (Day)** - Send a whisper under somebody else's name - 3 uses. > > **Espionage (Night)** - View all whispers tommorow - 2 uses. > > > *You win when the Unseen have eliminated all opposition*
> # [color=darkred]The Apostle[/color] > > [color=grey]**Cult Social**[/color] > > **Otherworldly Influence (Passive)** - Your vote counts as two for trials. This passive carries over if your class changes or if you're possessed. [Starting Apostle only] > > **Dark Words (Passive)** - Any message you type beginning with the word Cult: can only be read by Cultists. > > **Cult Pressure (Day)** - Same as current. - 3 uses. > > **Telepathy (Day)** - Same as current - 2 uses. > > **Shadow Conduit (Night)** - Link two players tonight, allowing them to talk with each other tonight. You will not hear their conversation. - 2 uses. > > **Occult Espionage (Night)** - View all whispers tomorrow - 2 uses. > *You win when all who oppose the Cult and its' gods have been cast into the void*
Gossip can be faked in this case via giving orders with Dark Words
----
So, how is it? Is it bad? Horrible? Somewhere in between?
I welcome your feedback below.

item.title: [Suggestion] Noble/Aristocrat/Apostle Rework
item.dc:creator: Icibalus
item.description:
The Noble

Blue Dragon Social

Influence (Passive) - Your vote secretly counts as two for trials and king elections. This passive carries over if your class changes or if you’re possessed.

Royal Blood (Passive) - All votes on you count as double in King elections.

Poltiical Pressure (Day) - Same as current. - 3 uses.

Gossip (Night) - Same as current. - Infinite uses

Espionage (Night) - View all whispers tommorow - 2 uses.

You win when all threats to the Blue Dragon have been eliminated

The Aristocrat

Unseen Social

Influence (Passive) - Your vote secretly counts as two for trials and King elections. This passive carries over if your class changes or if you’re possessed.

Royal Blood (Passive) - All votes on you count as double in King elections

Poltiical Pressure (Day) - Same as current. - 3 uses.

Intruige (Night) - Same as current. - Infinite uses

Espionage (Night) - View all whispers tomorrow - 2 uses.

You win when all threats to the Blue Dragon have been eliminated

The Apostle

Cult Social

Otherworldly Influence (Passive) - Your vote secretly counts as two for trials and king elections. This passive carries over if your class changes or if you’re possessed. [Starting Apostle only]

Dark Words (Passive) - You may whisper all members of the cult undetectably with “/w Cult [message]”.

Coraxian Catspaw (Day) - Force a player to vote another player. - 3 uses.

Telepathy (Day) - Same as current - 2 uses.

Occult Espionage (Night) - View all whispers tommorow - 2 uses

Mind Warp (Night) - Same as current - 3 uses.
You win when all who oppose the Cult and its’ Gods have been eliminated.

RIP new Gossip, I promise to make you a thing on some other class some day

Influence (Passive) - Your vote counts as two for trials. This passive carries over if your class changes or if you’re possessed.

I agree that the current Noble Twin needs changes, but doesn’t this make the self-confirmation even worse since it’s permanent now? I would be fine with it if it didn’t notify the court unless the vote makes a difference though.

Icibalus:

Gossip (Day) - Send a whisper under somebody else’s name - 3 uses.

Why does Noble need this? It doesn’t fit on a BD class. And what’s wrong with the current gossip?

Icibalus:

Cult Pressure (Day) - Same as current. - 3 uses.

Change the name. Cult pressure is boring and uncreative.

Icibalus:

Shadow Conduit (Night) - Link two players tonight, allowing them to talk with each other tonight. You will not hear their conversation. - 2 uses.

What’s wrong with Mind Warp? Plus this will make players less likely to speak in a Conduit, which isn’t needed.

Icibalus:

Shadow Conduit (Night) - Link two players tonight, allowing them to talk with each other tonight. You will not hear their conversation. - 2 uses.

Occult Espionage (Night) - View all whispers tomorrow - 2 uses.
You win when all who oppose the Cult and its’ gods have been cast into the void

Why did you change the names? They were fine.

Everything else is good.

Icibalus:

I’m thinking an alternate button then?

Here’s a few other alternatives:

  • Make dark words a passive private matter

  • Change Dark Words so it gives the cult a day chat

It would be worth it though.
